definition: heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: Review reserved tables and names of such; follow up on special arrangements for pre-assigned tables according to standards.
sentences.chinese: 查抄預定的桌子環境和客人姓名，跟進特別的擺設。

sentences.english: Anything to follow up after regular meeting or workshop coordination.
sentences.chinese: 開好每個定期會議，是否有什麼必須要跟進或協調。

sentences.english: Keeping up-to-date on cancer screening tests saves lives.
sentences.chinese: 及時跟進新的癌症篩查檢測可以挽救健康和生命。

sentences.english: Symbolically significant donations are pouring in too.
sentences.chinese: 象徵性意義重大的捐助也在跟進。

sentences.english: Then, just as you do in your career, follow through.
sentences.chinese: 然後，就像你在職業生涯中所作的，持續跟進。

sentences.english: Newspaper and magazine publishers as well as videogame makers should follow.
sentences.chinese: 報紙和雜誌出版商以及視頻遊戲生產商將會跟進。

sentences.english: Manage Lab Work Request and get proper approval.
sentences.chinese: 申請及跟進實驗室工作單。

sentences.english: Event site management and post-event follow-up activities.
sentences.chinese: 活動現場管理及會後跟進。

sentences.english: The professor was astounded and decided to pursue the matter further.
sentences.chinese: 這位教授在驚訝之餘，決定繼續跟進調查這個項目。

sentences.english: Once a prospect is generated, sales follow-ups are personalized and very soft touch.
sentences.chinese: 一旦產生預期，銷售跟進很個性化，而且有求必應。

sentences.english: Project follow up and mile-stone report, Organizing the pilot of the new product to mass production.
sentences.chinese: 項目跟進彙報和組織新產品的試產到量產。

sentences.english: To follow up and take action on overdue trade debts.
sentences.chinese: 應收賬超期超額的跟進及採取行動。

sentences.english: The after-sales department follows a boat throughout its service life.
sentences.chinese: 售後服務部門跟進船隻整個服務過程中的問題。

sentences.english: B: We check their production schedule against our orders almost every day.
sentences.chinese: 我們幾乎每天覈對他們的生產進度以跟進訂單。

sentences.english: Follow up new molder machining process and solve all issues on site.
sentences.chinese: 跟進新模具的加工流程並解決現場的所有問題。

sentences.english: Customers who do sub-specialized personnel to follow up.
sentences.chinese: 做到客戶分人跟進專人專管。

definition: investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
